Play peexi

peexi punk

An online MMO game based on the F2T (free to play) model, set in a cyberpunk style. It operates within a large platform ecosystem.

Play closed beta test

About the project

Explore the Future World

Join us

Blockchain and Technologies

Our world is filled with neon lights of megacities, giant corporations and endless opportunities for exploration and adventure. In Peexi Punk you will:

Explore detailed locations, from dark alleys to high-tech laboratories.

Meet and interact with many unique NPCs, each with their own goals and stories.

Get involved in dynamic events and missions that develop the main storyline.

The storyline unfolds in the future, in the star system of Kronaris. Here, among numerous planets, one of the human colonies and other intelligent races are searching for the new worlds to colonize. These explorers are called Progress Seekers. The game's plot develops on two planets, where the bravery and resourcefulness of the Seekers will determine the future of the

entire system. Join this incredible adventure and become part of the epic saga of interstellar exploration.

Planet

Astrania

The first planet, where all adventurers land, serves as a neutral zone and the starting point for the adventure. The planet is equipped with high-tech hubs, including shopping centers and research laboratories. You can purchase apartments that allow you
to mine the local currency – astrocredits.

Planet

Kronoskar

The planet where Seekers go for the main storyline consists of seven combat zones, each with its unique style and features. Each location is inhabited by unique monsters and contains dungeons with mysterious artifacts and rare resources necessary for progressing through the storyline and upgrading equipment.

Unique classes

The game features five unique classes, each tied to a specific race. Each class has its distinct playstyle and is suited for various tasks: from dealing damage to enemies to tanking attacks and engaging in positional battles.

Battle Mage

01

Uses ancient crystals for pyromancy and other forms of magic.

Skill tree

active abilities

In Peexi Punk, players have access to abilities that deal damage, provide defense, or perform other actions during battles, actively interacting with the world and influencing the outcome of the fights.

Store items

Items from the shop are purchased on the platform's internal marketplace. These items have unique qualities and properties.

Auction

The in-game auction is a platform where players can buy and sell items using game tokens. Tokens are earned in the game, for achievements, or purchased with real money, providing equal opportunities for everyone.

Players can acquire various items on the auction using these tokens, which can be earned through gameplay, completing quests, achievements, or purchased with real money.

This system creates a balance between in-game effort and monetary investment, ensuring equal opportunities for progress for all players.

Players can list their items on the auction, whether it's rare weapons, unique skins, resources, or other valuable in-game objects. Sellers set the price in tokens, and other players can purchase items at the listed price.

Go to auction

Exchange

Arcade season

“Start of the journey”

The Arcade Season consists of story acts that reveal the game's narrative. The first acts will cover the beginning of the journey and the planets in the star system. Users will receive rewards for completing tasks within the acts.

Eco system

The game ecosystem includes the game itself, an auction, an in-game goods store, a launchpad, staking, token exchange, arcade season, and a player's personal account.

[01]

game

The central element of the ecosystem, where players earn tokens and items that can be used in other parts of the ecosystem.

[02]

Auction

Allows players to buy and sell items using in-game tokens, encouraging active trading and economic development within the game.

[01]

game

The central element of the ecosystem, where players earn tokens and items that can be used in other parts of the ecosystem.

[03]

In-Game Goods Store

The central element of the ecosystem, where players earn tokens and items that can be used in other parts of the ecosystem.Offers various items such as skins, weapons, and upgrades for in-game tokens. The store is regularly updated with new items.

[01]

game

The central element of the ecosystem, where players earn tokens and items that can be used in other parts of the ecosystem.

[04]

Launchpad

Enables players to purchase collectible items by investing their tokens and receiving rewards in case of success.

[05]

Staking

Provides an opportunity to earn passive income by locking tokens for a specific period, with rewards paid in additional tokens.

[06]

Token exchange

In the personal account, players can exchange in-game tokens for the company’s token, converting in-game achievements into a more universal value.

[07]

ARCADE SEASON

Gives access to exclusive tasks and rewards. For completing tasks, players receive bonuses and items that can be used in the game or sold at auction.

[08]

Personal Account

The central management hub where players can track achievements, manage tokens, participate in auctions and staking, exchange tokens, and activate the battle pass.
